item.description:
Hello All,

This is a half marathon I ran last year that's so lovely I thought I'd do it again.

http://www.locorunnin...

Here's what the website says about it... "One of the most popular spring half marathons around! Kick off your spring with a run or walk on one of the most beautiful country roads in New Hampshire . This half marathon course travels over a designated scenic road along the Great Bay Estuary offering water views of Great Bay and idyllic mill town Newmarket. Course is moderately challenging but the views are well worth it."

Please note on here whether you're willing to carpool and can offer or need a ride... it's just over an hours drive from Boston.

Any questions, then please let me know.

Take care... Martin

P.S. you're responsible for your own registration, safety etc. etc.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Great Bay, New Hampshire Half Marathon
